description:
Job Description

ILIA is seeking a Brand Partnerships Consultant (Contract) to support the Director of Brand Marketing in growing the ILIA brand through strategic partnerships, thoughtful campaigns, and events. By working closely with cross-functional partners, supporting internal processes, and communicating effectively, this role will play a critical role in ensuring the seamless implementation of brand initiatives.

This role is hybrid (estimated 2-days in-person per week) and open to candidates based in Los Angeles Metropolitan area.

Additionally, please note that team ILIA will be taking a pause from December 25-29, 2023 for the holidays and we'll be reviewing applications in early January upon our return. We appreciate your patience and consideration.

Responsibilities:
• Execute partnership coordination including product sends, cost analysis, internal team alignment, asset delivery & scheduling
• New partnership ideation & outreach
• Support brand director in maintaining internal documents and programs - integrated calendar, monthly omni, asana etc.
• Coordinate logistics for experiential events as needed
• Create event recaps and post mortems outlining key learnings
• Collaborate with Marketing team to bring campaigns to life and ensure consistency across all touch points
• Own sourcing and development of branded merchandise

Job requirements
• 4+ years of brand partnerships experience, brand side, with a beauty, wellness or lifestyle brand
• Detail-oriented, organized, and effective communicator
• Demonstrated ability to own and manage campaign & event deliverables from concept to delivery
• Passionate about beauty trends, tastemakers and influencers in the category

What We Would Like To Offer...
• Base rate: $25-40/hour DOE*
• ILIA Products - Quarterly stipend to replenish your favorite products and try new ones
• This is the anticipated hourly rate for this position. The hourly rate offered will carefully consider a few factors including your skills, qualifications, experience, and location.

About ILIA

ILIA makes clean skin-centric beauty. We see skincare and makeup as one and believe that skin should look like skin. With transparency as our guide and color as our vehicle, we challenge the conventions of clean beauty to create something radically new, through safe, groundbreaking formulas that protect + revive the skin. Headquartered in Laguna Beach, California, ILIA brings together a strong group of innovative thinkers, rule-breakers and creative problem solvers. We pave the way forward as the leading clean makeup brand in what is being called the Clean Beauty Revolution. Fast paced growth provides constant learning, collaborative teamwork, and the desire to be the best at what you do. We celebrate taking risks and doing what hasn’t been done before.
